newsitem.title: USA: Paradigm Medical sees Q1 revs $1.2 mln.
newsitem.headline: Paradigm Medical sees Q1 revs $1.2 mln.

text.p: Paradigm Medical Industries Inc said on Tuesday that its operating revenues for the first quarter ending March 31, 1997 will be about $1.2 million versus $23,171 for the comparable period in 1996.

Paradigm said the revenue was generated from initial shipments of its Photon laser cataract removal system and its laser-ready Precisionist ThirtyThousand, the latest generation of ultrasound technology.
